trans-unit.source: Provides properties that control authentication parameters and protection level for the TCP transport.
trans-unit.target: 為 TCP 傳輸提供控制驗證參數及保護層級的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This class is used by <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpSecurity.Transport%2A> to set the transport-level security settings for a binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpSecurity.Transport%2A> 會使用這個類別來為繫結設定傳輸層級的安全性設定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.TcpTransportSecurity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.TcpTransportSecurity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of client credential used for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於驗證的用戶端認證類型。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.TcpClientCredentialType" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.TcpClientCredentialType" />。

trans-unit.source: The return value can be one of the following enumeration members:
trans-unit.target: 傳回值可以是下列其中一個列舉成員：

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to access and set this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼示範如何存取及設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the extended protection policy for the TCP transport.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 TCP 傳輸的延伸保護原則。

trans-unit.source: The extended protection policy for the TCP transport.
trans-unit.target: TCP 傳輸的延伸保護原則。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" /> for the TCP stream.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 TCP 資料流的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.TcpTransportSecurity.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.TcpTransportSecurity.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> 屬性是否已變更為非預設值且應該序列化。

trans-unit.source: It is used by WCF for XAML integration.
trans-unit.target: 這項資訊會由 WCF 用於 XAML 整合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.TcpTransportSecurity.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應序列化 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.TcpTransportSecurity.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> 屬性值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the list of SSL/TLS protocols to negotiate when using a client credential type of TcpClientCredentialType.Certificate.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用用戶端認證類型 TcpClientCredentialType.Certificate 時所要交涉的 SSL/TLS 通訊協定清單。

trans-unit.source: The value can be a combination of one of more of the following enumeration members: Ssl3, Tls, Tls11, Tls12.
trans-unit.target: 此值可以是下列一或多個列舉成員的組合：Ssl3、Tls、Tls11、Tls12。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is Ssl3 | Tls | Tls11 | Tls12.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 Ssl3 | Tls | Tls11 | Tls12。

trans-unit.source: Versions of the framework prior to 4.6 only support Ssl3 and Tls.
trans-unit.target: 4.6 之前的 framework 版本只支援 Ssl3 和 Tls。

trans-unit.source: If these are not included, communication with earlier versions of the framework will not be possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些未包含，與舊版 framework 的通訊不可能。

trans-unit.source: Specifying Tls11 and/or Tls12 will disable the usage of Ssl3, even if it has been included.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Tls11 及/或 Tls12 會停用 Ssl3，即使它已包含在內。
